title: Projects
content: Here are some of the websites and apps I build for fun and/or to learn something new.

list.title: Codesparks
list.content: I build this personal website with bootstrap, scss and Vue/Nuxt

list.title: Hedera Helix
list.content: This dApp encourages long-term use of products and buying and selling more products secondhand by attaching a smart contract to each product, which contains a small additional deposit amount. 60% of this deposit is returned over time, 30% is given to a secondhand buyer and 10% is donated to an environmental charity.

list.title: The Hederian Mint
list.content: Created a small collection of 3-dimensional NFTâ€™s representing digital HBAR coins and developed a small website showcasing this collection with Vue and Nuxt.
